body.p: On 31 January 20X1 (at the end of month 1) when Entity A tests effectiveness, LIBOR has decreased. Based on historical prepayment experience, Entity A estimates that, as a consequence, prepayments will occur faster than previously estimated. As a result it re‑estimates the amount of assets scheduled into this time period (excluding new assets originated during the month) as CU96 million.
